text: Escape from Alcatraz is a 1979 American prison/thriller/action movie. It was directed by Don Siegel. It stars Clint Eastwood, Larry Hankin, Patrick McGoohan, Fred Ward, Roberts Blossom and Danny Glover. It was released by Paramount Pictures to positive reviews on June 22, 1979. title: Escape from Alcatraz (movie)
